text: Gisele Bündchen is all about standing by her man! On Saturday, the supermodel stopped by husband Tom Brady ‘ s practice ahead of his big Super Bowl LII game tomorrow at the U. S. Bank Stadium in Minneapolis, Minnesota. But she didn ’ t come alone! Brady ’ s doting wife brought along their kids, Vivian Lake and Benjamin, and the rest of the footballer ’ s tight - knit family ahead of tomorrow ’ s big match - up. Tomorrow, Brady will lead the New England Patriots against the Philadelphia Eagles during football ’ s biggest night of the year. The Pats ’ quarterback shared an Instagram photo of the whole crew, along with the simple but clear caption, “ Family and Football # gopats. ”
